text: @ScramPratchett Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, as if they had difficulty remembering it.

passages.fragment: Good old Mistress Slightly , Vimes thought , as
passages.full_quote: <used>Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, as</used> he stood in this gloomy cave surrounded by ranks of silent, solemn goblins
They're just standing there, <used>Vimes thought, as if they</used>'re on parade

passages.fragment: , as if they had difficulty remembering it
passages.full_quote: Mort passed night watchmen, whose job now appeared to consist of ringing bells and shouting the name of the Princess, but a little uncertainly<used>, as if they had difficulty remembering it</used>
